amendment.description: To authorize funding for a human resources benefit call center for the Navy.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2461 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2461 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Snowe. (consideration: CR S12497-12513; text: CR S12509) To authorize funding for a human resources benefit call center for the Navy.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2461 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2461 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Snowe.
